long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives developers access to useful tools. Like highlighting elements of the DOM to show eventual displaying errors, or preventing you from closing a tab without accepting first, and more. All with a very simplistic approach.
